text: The introduction is now complete.
The actual study consists of 4 parts, each of which takes approximately the same amount of time (approximately 5 minutes).
You will receive additional instructions before beginning Part 4.
data.caption: Content

text: Let's go!

Please ensure your environment is free from distractions. Disturbances can reduce the quality of the collected data. Please turn off your cell phone, close all messaging apps, and ask your colleagues not to disturb you.
data.caption: Part 1

text: Press the spacebar when you're sure you've found the error. Now press the spacebar to begin.

text: You have now edited 3 snippets, in each of which you found a content error.

You'll see three more snippets in this section (A, B, and C). This time, your task is to find a syntax error. This task is easier, so editing these three snippets together will likely take as long as any of the previous sections.
This time the code is correct in terms of content, but it cannot be compiled because of the syntax error.
data.caption: Part 4

text: Remember that the snippet now has a syntactic error and not a content error.
Press the spacebar when you're sure you've found the error. Now press the spacebar to begin.
